basics.name: Sergio Acosta Quintana
basics.label: Full-Stack Engineer (Backend Focused) | Java & Cloud
basics.summary: Full-Stack Engineer (Backend-focused) specializing in high-availability microservices and event-driven architectures. Modernized enterprise systems at IKEA, improving latency, reliability, and efficiency. Focused on distributed systems, cloud infrastructure, and CI/CD automation. Proficient in React/TypeScript for full-stack autonomy. Experienced in distributed international teams.

work.name: IKEA / BITBOX S.L.
highlights: Architected Spring Boot microservices for IKEA's loyalty platform processing 2M+ monthly transactions for 400k+ users with 99.9% uptime SLA.
Led PL/SQL to Kafka migration (15+ topics, 50k+ daily events) implementing circuit breakers, retry logic, and replacing 7 manual jobs via GitHub Actions automation, reducing processing 55%.
Built retail insurance sales platform integrating multiple providers (Maffrey, Adeslas) into unified microservices manager with Kafka-based communication, JWT auth, and RBAC.

projects.name: NEXO CLOUD (SaaS)
highlights: Architected production-grade RAG system (Spring Boot + Redis + Cloudflare R2) on Hetzner VPS processing 30k+ docs monthly. Implemented Testcontainers for integration testing.
Designed async pipeline (1k+ docs/hour, p99 <200ms) with event sourcing, worker pools, and dead letter queues. Automated PostgreSQL (PG Vector) backups on own-managed infrastructure.
Built React dashboard for document monitoring with JWT auth UI. Optimized costs 30% via caching, batch processing, and query tuning.

education.institution: University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
